| area_total_km2 = 20.21 | area_land_km2 = 20.15 | area_water_km2 = 0.06 | population_density_km2 = 3876.66 | pop_est_as_of = | pop_est_footnotes = | population_est = }} Evanston is a city in Illinois in the United States. It is 12 miles (19 km) north to the center of Chicago, and is a part of the Chicago Metropolitan Area. The mayor of Evanston is Daniel Biss. In March 2021, after Evanston passed a measure offering reparations to black residents over slavery, becoming the first in the United States to do so. ==Well-known people born in Evanston== * Charlton Heston (d. 2008), actor * John C. Whitehead (d. 2015), politician, Deputy Secretary of State * William Christopher (d. 2016), actor * Anthony Downs (1930-), political scientist, economist * Peter Ueberroth (d. 2021), American executive * Grace Slick (1939-), singer of rock music * William Petersen (1953-), actor * Elizabeth McGovern (1961-), actress * Eddie Vedder (1964-), singer, songwriter, guitar player * John Cusack (1966-), actor ==References== Category:Cities in Illinois Category:Suburbs of Chicago Category:Settlements in Cook County, Illinois
